name: Ferrari Virtual Race
summary:
Among car companies, Ferrari stands alone as a symbol of luxury, power, and grace under pressure. Few auto fans would give up the chance for a virtual test-drive of these wonderful machines, and this is exactly the appeal of "Ferrari Virtual Race" to newer and older gamers alike.

If you've ever wanted to experience the feel of taking out a Ferrari on a track, this game might be for you. If you or someone you love is a car fanatic, few games offer quite the punch of the game, which allows players to get behind the wheel of several classic Ferrari sports cars and have fun on a compelling track and landscape.

The key-word here is fun: For many, this game will be a sort of dream come true. Featuring the chance to "test drive" the 430 Scuderia, 599 Fiorano and 612 Scaglietti models of Ferrari, the game is a great introduction to what makes the company such a powerhouse in the auto and racing industries.
